Armenia.notes: Hrazdan Thermal Power Plant (gas fired) was acquired by Russian state-owned Rosneftegaz in 2003, then sold to Tashir Group in 2011

Argentina.notes: Major privatizations occurred in 1992 when IPPs entered the country

Australia.notes: Pre 1989 had IPPs operating in certain parts, Victoria had IPPs since 1880 - thermal coal plants

Germany.notes: Market liberalization in 1998 enabled private generators, primarily wind

Spain.notes: Market liberalization enabled IPPs, strong wind development

Poland.notes: IPPs entered after market reforms in 2000

Denmark.notes: Early wind power development with private producers

Chile.notes: Early market liberalization allowed IPPs since 1982
